document_data.name: Hesken-P'aj Symryvvin
document_data.mainbody: '''Hesken-P'aj Symryvvin''' was the matron of the 18th house of [[Menzoberranzan]] and the most powerful priestess of [[Lolth]] in the city.
document_data.Personality: The matron and her family was sometimes referred to as "the eyes of Lolth".
document_data.History: Hesken-P'aj was chosen by the Spider Queen to declare her godly will to the twenty most powerful matrons in the year of [[1361 DR]] after a [[yochlol]] announced that peace should be among the houses.
